column2: "H-hello there. Sorry for sighing, it's just that I got yelled at..."
"\"Fight more seriously!\", they say, it's just that I don't have the will to fight to begin with.."
"I wonder just who decided that ARKS members have to fight even in desperate situations..."
"Fighting just because you can sounds more like random violence than logic..."
"Sorry for wasting your time, I'll just try to fight enough to not get yelled at..."
